brainly_data.question: Need to know the definitions for median mean and mode im trying to freshen up for my GED exam and really cant remember alot of the questions on the mathematics part
brainly_data.subject: Mathematics

all_answers.question: Need to know the definitions for median mean and mode im trying to freshen up for my GED exam and really cant remember alot of the questions on the mathematics part
all_answers.subject: Mathematics
all_answers.text:
Median - The middle number in a range of values
Mean - The average of a range of numbers
Mode - Number that shows up the most in a range of values

all_answers.question: Need to know the definitions for median mean and mode im trying to freshen up for my GED exam and really cant remember alot of the questions on the mathematics part
all_answers.subject: Mathematics
all_answers.text: Mean is the medium of the given set, found by adding up all of the numbers and dividing by the amount of items in the set. Mode is the most frequently occurring number, and median is the number with the middle value.
